name: Faster Chef
description:
You are a chef in a demanding resturant

Cook your food, and don't let too many orders pile up.

DEVELOPMENT NOTE:

I am very aware that this is very bare-bones but if I had more time/energy I'd definitely add more and I do hope to make this a fuller game

This game was made solo in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 37 (Theme One Room). I was pretty busy during the weekend and sent most of Monday at school so it's not got as much content as I'd like

TOOLS USED:

- Unity (Engine)

- Aseprite (Art)

- Visual Studio 2015 CE and Mono Develop (Programming)

- Git (Source Control)

Instructions/Controls:

Escape/P: Pause Game

I: Open ingredients panel

A/D/Left Arrow/Right Arrow: Move Left/Right

In the game orders for food come in every 10 seconds, you must not let the orders pile up above 5. To complete the orders you must 'buy' (no money system yet) ingredients, patties for burgers need to be cooked. To make a meal you must use the 'maker 1s' (MK1), you put the food in at the top and when all the right ingredients are added you get the food, to finish it as an order you put it through the vent.
